For those who don't understand how to do this, I've just downloaded using LimeWire, and extracted both the zipped files to my Desktop.

I then run the db_pro_6_2_trial installation, and then copied and pasted the 2 applications from the 62crack folder into the Compiler folder (Programs->The Game Creators->Dark Basic Pro Trial->Compiler) and run Dark Basic from the shortcut on my Desktop. There's nothing saying it's a trial, so I assume the crack worked.

I'm going to have a bash at it now, I used to program in BASIC on the Spectrum +2, Atari ST and Amiga 600 so have some knowledge. Good Luck.
